text: Nassir Abo-Jalas (born June 11, 1994) is a Saudi Arabian professional basketball player. He currently plays for Uhud Medina of the Saudi Premier League. He represented Saudi Arabia's national basketball team at the 2017 Arab Nations Basketball Championship in Egypt. There, he was his team's top scorer.Saudi Arabia National Team News, .., Asia-basket.com, accessed 22 April 2017. Further, he represented Saudi Arabia's national 3x3 team at the 2013 FIBA Asia 3x3 Championship in Doha, Qatar, where he led his team to win the silver medal.Saudi Arabia Line-Up: FIBA Asia 2013 Championship (Team Roster Preview) Ed Umbao, Philippine News, 31 July 2013. Accessed 22 April 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Asia-basket.com Profile * FIBA Archive Profile Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Saudi Arabian men's basketball players Category:People from Medina
title: Nassir Abo-Jalas
